name: Coalizione del Fixed Wireless Access
goal:
The Coalition was founded in April 2016, thanks to efforts of 60 economic operators coming from the whole production chain. It includes a wide range of companies: from vendors, towerco and system integrators to wireless internet service providers (WISP) and satellite operators.

The Coalition aims at becoming a body of synthesis and institutional representation of the whole FWA industry. Especially referring to the "Digital Agenda for Europe" targets for 2020 and the on-going ultrabroadband (BUL) strategy of the Italian government.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market

Telecoms Single Market

Telecoms framework review

All provisions widely relating telecoms market, with a special focus on ultrabroadband services to support and supply in rural, sub-urban and remote areas.
